str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To love, wish well to, take pleasure in, long for; denotes the love of reason, esteem. Perhaps from agan; to love.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From the same as oikodome; to be a house-builder, i.e. Construct or confirm.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From sunago; an assemblage of persons; specially, a Jewish 'synagogue'; by analogy, a Christian church.
